title: OHDSI Concept Set
description: A standardized collection of medical concepts representing a clinical phenomenon

id.description: Unique identifier for the concept set

name.description: Human-readable name for the concept set

description.description: Optional detailed description of the concept set purpose and contents

version.description: Version identifier for the concept set

createdBy.description: Username or identifier of the concept set creator

createdDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of concept set creation

modifiedBy.description: Username or identifier of the last modifier

createdByTool.description: Name and version of the tool used to create the concept set (e.g., 'ATLAS 2.12.0', 'CAPR 4.3', 'Custom Script v1.0')

modifiedByTool.description: Name and version of the tool used for the last modification (e.g., 'ATLAS 2.12.0', 'CAPR 4.3')

expression.description: The logical expression defining which concepts are included

tags.description: Optional array of tags for categorization

conceptExpressionItem.description: An individual concept with inclusion/exclusion rules

isExcluded.description: Whether this concept should be excluded from the set

includeDescendants.description: Whether to include descendant concepts in the hierarchy

includeMapped.description: Whether to include concepts mapped to this concept

concept.description: A standardized medical concept from OMOP vocabulary

conceptName.description: Human-readable concept name (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

domainId.description: OMOP domain (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

vocabularyId.description: Source vocabulary (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

conceptClassId.description: Classification within the vocabulary (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

standardConcept.description: Standard concept designation (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

conceptCode.description: Original code from source vocabulary (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

validStartDate.description: Date when concept became valid (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

validEndDate.description: Date when concept becomes invalid (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)

invalidReason.description: Reason for concept invalidation (optional, can be resolved from vocabulary)
